title: Perma ban
body:
I played league for 2+ years until i got banned...

Im just saying that i have been perma ban for a while and i feel like i have changed i got banned around December 2015 and i was young and dumb im not gonna sugar coat it but i love this game and i want to come back here is my full chatlog

Game 1
Akumara: no flash
Akumara: all day today wanted zed
Akumara: never got le sigh
Akumara: k
Akumara: dam it i knew it
Akumara: nj
Akumara: mid mia
Akumara: can i blue?
Akumara: I TOLD U
Akumara: NICE STUN
Akumara: lol
Akumara: can u guys PLS
Akumara: STOP TAKING KILLS FROM EM
Akumara: im shit without kills
Akumara: my lane is over
Akumara: thx for feeding her and taking my kills
Akumara: dont bother coming mid for ank
Akumara: she is just gonna 2v1
Akumara: u guys fed ahri
Akumara: its over
Akumara: i did
Akumara: still got shit on
Akumara: she is F
Akumara: E
Akumara: D
Akumara: fed
Akumara: ur jhin she is ahri
Akumara: U GUYS ARE SOO DUMB!
Akumara: JUMPED INTO A 2V5
Akumara: ITS FUCKIN GAME
Akumara: FF!
Akumara: BECAUSE U GUYS FED AHRI EARLY
Akumara: AGAIN I DO ALL THE WORK AND THEY KS
Akumara: FUCK THIS TEAM
Akumara: fuck team
Akumara: its called solo q not team q
Akumara: thx team
Akumara: nj wasting ur ult on me
Akumara: really good idea
Akumara: report this team
Akumara: this team so trash
Akumara: atleast tyler1 is good
Akumara: what u want a cookie for doing somthing right?
Akumara: gotch bitch
Akumara: end this shtty game
Akumara: only 2 were up u could have ended
Akumara: do baron
Akumara: see how that will hemp
Akumara: ez pz
Akumara: smart one team
Akumara: run from the ADC THAT DOSENT DO DAMAGE
Akumara: AND THE SUPPORT NJ
Akumara: Fuckin nerds
Akumara: thx for the help %%%gots
Akumara: challanger dumb fuck
Akumara: fuckin boosted animal
Akumara: i love how this malp wastes his ult on me
Akumara: fuckin smart as fuck
Akumara: u know what u belong on the top teir
Akumara: fuckin bronze
Akumara: u belong ther
Akumara: %%%
Akumara: NICE
Akumara: LOVE THAT FOCUS
Akumara: WHEN U BACKDOOR U GO FOR GAME NOT KILLS DUMB FUCK
Akumara: i wont be surprised if we still lose this
Akumara: because u guys are trash
Akumara: because u guys took all my kills
Akumara: gg
Akumara: team at baron
Akumara: meant drag
Akumara: distraction op
Akumara: rekt nerds
Akumara: go play minecraft bitches
Game 2
Akumara: lol
Akumara: fuck this team im going afk
Akumara: fuck u shaco im taking ur blue
Akumara: going back mid
Akumara: LOL
Akumara: mid no sums
Akumara: think this lee is mad
Akumara: k
Akumara: im suck
Akumara: mid is open
Akumara: fuck gonna fuck up lee junge now
Akumara: bot lane?
Akumara: this game would have been alot better if i had zed
Akumara: thx
Akumara: nj
Akumara: the bm
Akumara: 15 more
Akumara: i need dev
Akumara: atleast give me that since u took my zed
Akumara: dam dar
Akumara: watch were u spin
Akumara: 7 more
Akumara: WIAT
Akumara: son of a bitch
Akumara: that was gonnab e 8
Akumara: 1 MORE
Akumara: i got 4k gold
Akumara: time to buy
Akumara: 2 items
Akumara: k
Akumara: all i need is rage blade and im god
Akumara: gg ez

I know im a toxic sht %%% but that was 15 yr old me im sure im changed so can i get unbanned?{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body:
You won't get back your account.

Talk with the chat logs that censor word might hate speech.
Riot never unbans accounts unless it was a mistake. Yours clearly wasn't.

Riot only banned the account, you're more than welcome to rejoin the game whenever
and its been two years by now you're second account has to be viable?

Once banned it really cant be unbanned unless it was done in error
Or the riot gods give you a blessing(.000000000000000000000000000000000add0'stoinfinity1% chance)

Akumara: thx for the help %%%gots

bai

>Akumara: thx for the help %%%gots

Take that shit elsewhere.

They won't unban ur acc, but im 98% sure they will give you a response along the lines of...

You're free to make a new account.
